articles.title: Congratulatory Message to President of Zambia
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to President of Zambia

					Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent Saturday a message to Michael Chilufya Sata to congratulate him on his election as president of Zambia.
					
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Zambia would continue growing strong, Kim in the message wished the president success in his future work for the country's stability and development.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Congratulated on His Successful Visits to Russia and China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Congratulated on His Successful Visits to Russia and China

					Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association released a statement on Sept. 20 congratulating leader Kim Jong Il upon his successful visits to the Russian Federation and the People's Republic of China.
					
					The statement said:
					
					The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association received exciting news that he paid historic visits to the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of the Russian Federation and the Northeast region of the People's Republic of China from August 20 to 27 this year.
					
					We are confident that his visits to Russia and China marked historical events of particular significance in further developing the traditional DPRK-Russia and DPRK-China friendly relations, safeguarding the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and triumphantly advancing global independence. We warmly congratulate Kim Jong Il upon his successful historic foreign tours.
					
					The undying feats performed by him in external activities will always go down in history.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Successful Visit to Russia
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Successful Visit to Russia

					Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The council of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a special meeting on Thursday to congratulate leader Kim Jong Il on his successful visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of Russia.
					
					A speaker said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il visited the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of Russia in August, drawing special attention of the world.
					
					During his visit he held talks with the top leader of Russia and exchanged views on important issues related to the development of the DPRK-Russia relations, he noted. 
					
					His visit to Russia was of great significance in boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and protecting global peace and stability, he said, adding its vitality is being displayed.
